description: The conmen wore a silicone mask of Jean-Yves Le Drian to trick wealthy people during video calls.
title: Le Drian case: Fraudsters who wore mask of French minister jailed
title_page: Le Drian case: Fraudsters who wore mask of French minister jailed - BBC News
maintext: Prosecutors say evidence was found on the mobile phones of Chikli, 54, and Lasarevitsch, 35, after their arrest in Ukraine, suggesting that they planned to impersonate Prince Albert II of Monaco next. There were mobile phone pictures of a silicone mask of Prince Albert.
